title: Patio/Balcony, Ceiling Fan, New Lighting and Plumbing Packages
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Professional bi-lingual staff', '-New Playground!', '-Upgraded Swimming Pool Areas With All New Furniture and Cabanas', '-New Stylish and Insulating Roofing', '-Satellite', '-Carpeting', '-Renovated and Expanded Clubhouse With a Refreshed Fitness Center', '-New Dog Park!', '-Private Patio', '-Hard Surface', 'Flooring With 4.5 Inch Base Boards', '-Disposal', '-Refrigerator', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
